column.name: MC
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if(GLLX==1)
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CPMC FROM PIF.TPIF_CPDM WHERE ID="+GLID);
else if(GLLX==2)
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT JGJC FROM PIF.TPIF_JGDM WHERE ID="+GLID);
else
null;

column.name: MC
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if(O_MASTER.GLLX==1)
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CPMC FROM PIF.TPIF_CPDM WHERE ID="+O_MASTER.GLID);
else if(O_MASTER.GLLX==2)
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT JGJC FROM PIF.TPIF_JGDM WHERE ID="+O_MASTER.GLID);
else
null;

restriction.name: TPIF_CPWDK_GXBB_R1
restriction.prompt: 此处只允许更新产品相关文档

restriction.name: TPIF_CPWDK_GXBB_R2
restriction.prompt: 已披露的文档不允许进行更新！
